sentences.en: And how is this ham mousse made?
sentences.cn: 这道火煺奶油冻是怎么做的?

sentences.en: Apply Satinique Styling Mousse ( 0732 ) at hair tips , loosen up with fingers.
sentences.cn: 用仙姬定发香沫 ( 0732 ) 涂于发尾, 再用手指弄松头发.

sentences.en: Care: The hair styling , hair to make regular, beautiful , can add more mousse stereotypes.
sentences.cn: 另外,位于会阴 、 足底的经常受摩擦的部位黑痣也容易发生恶变.

sentences.en: He had even put mousse in his hair.
sentences.cn: 他甚至还往头发上抹了摩丝。

sentences.en: Here's your White Chocolate Mousse Cake and two forks.
sentences.cn: 这里是您点白巧克力慕斯蛋糕及二副叉子.
翻译如下;我爱这个摩丝.

sentences.en: Shall I put some mousse on?
sentences.cn: 让我加点摩丝,好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Some mousse will help to set the hair.
sentences.cn: 擦些摩丝能帮助头发定型.

sentences.en: Spoon mousse mixture into 6 dessert dishes and chill 3 - 4 hours or overnight.
sentences.cn: 将慕斯分到6个甜品碗里,入冰箱 3-4 小时或是隔夜冷藏.

sentences.en: The peach pies and chocolate mousse cakes are nearly finished.
sentences.cn: 桃子派和巧克力慕斯蛋糕也总是差不多卖完.

sentences.en: The sweet was a mousse flavoured with whisky.
sentences.cn: 甜点是威士忌口味的慕斯。

sentences.en: Up for purchase, Maybelline dream mousse blush - peach satin, # 20 Air - whipped formula adds natural - looking color to cheeks.
sentences.cn: 为购买, 美宝莲慕思腮红梦桃缎子, # 20Air,掀起公式增加了自然的色彩脸颊.

sentences.en: We'll have the White Chocolate Mousse Cake with two forks please.
sentences.cn: 我们想点白巧克力慕斯蛋糕及二副叉子.

sentences.en: What kind of hair - styling products do you use? Gel? Mousse? Hair spray?
sentences.cn: 你用哪种头发造型产品? 口者哩? 摩丝? 还是喷发剂?

sentences.en: Would you like me to use some hairspray or mousse?
sentences.cn: 我女朋友总是说我的头发油乎乎的.

trans.tran_en: a substance full of small bubbles that you put in your hair to make it look thicker or to hold its style in place
